1.0.0.name: wordpress/archivist-custom-archive-templates
1.0.0.description:
Quick Start

The plugin assumes your articles are well categorized. To display the archive, use the shortcode anywhere in a page or article.

[archivist category="kitten"]
[archivist tag="kitten"]

Replace "kitten" with your category/tag. Watch out, we need the slug here. That's the name without capital letters and spaces.

Placeholders

You can specify a custom template to display the archive elements. Go to Settings > Archivist for plugin preferences. Use HTML and any of the following template placeholders.

  • %TITLE% - The post title.
  • %PERMALINK% - The post permalink.
  • %AUTHOR% - The post author.
  • %CATEGORIES% - The post categories as unordered list.
  • %CATEGORIES|...% - The post categories with a custom separator. Example: %CATEGORIES|, %
  • %TAGS% - The post
